name: Gun Kata
description:
Gun Kata is a singleplayer third person looter shooter slasher taking place in a hyper corporatized, cyber-enhanced world. Take control of RONIN, a last of it's kind combat bot prototype, as you aid the Teer-Racket Corporation with stopping the new global threat, Mechrotic Outbreaks. Craft weapons, explore desolate refugee centers, defend the corporate base, upgrade cybernetic abilities and more!

Gun Kata is still actively in development. This release is the Alpha release, meant as a playtest. More systems, items, and polish are actively on the way and updates will be here as major milestones are reached.

Featured in this release is:

  • Explore Refugee Site Xu
  • Talk to set NPCs by tapping on their nametag
  • Change gear with the Teer-Racket Entity Analysis Pad
  • Requisition new gear from the Requisition Officer
    • Earn materials to requisition gear from Expedition and Defense modes!
    • There are currently 22 total unlockable weapons, 5 are given to the player to test immediately.
  • Upgrade the Time Slow skill tree, with 3 more abilities on the way
  • Talk to Sanders to go on missions
    • Expeditions are randomly generated dungeons featuring enemies, loot, and an end goal to turn on the Site's Firewall
      • Expeditions currently only has one difficulty
      • **This mode is very new and is still going through major bug fixes**
    • Defenses are timed missions to defend Site Xu's outer perimeter 
      • Defenses have different tiers that determine time and enemy spawns.
      • There are 2 different enemies currently, each with 3 elemental variants that determine their immunities.
